title: Exposure Margin
text: Clinical information: Human Proposed “Start Dose”: 1.5 mg/day Dog Human conversion factor = 1.8 Dog 4 week (IV) study: HED = Human Equivalent Dose Exposure Margin Calculation HED = Animal Dose / Conversion factor Dog Human conversion factor 1.8 = 0.25/1.8 = 0.139 mg/kg/day =0.8/1.8 =0.44 mg/kg/day =2.5/1.8 =1.39 mg/kg/day mg/kg/day —> mg/day Human weight 60 kg =0.139*60 =8.33 mg/day =0.44*60 =26.67 mg/day =1.39*60 =83.33 mg/day Proposed Human Start Dose =1.5 mg/day Exposure Margin = HED/Human dose =8.33/1.5 =5.6 26.67/1.5 =17.78 =83.33/1.5 =55.55

code: @Manual{,   title = {toxSummary: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results},   author = {Yousuf Ali and Kevin Snyder},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: Package can installed CRAN published CRAN. Development version can installed GitHub.
code: #install toxSummary package install.packages("toxSummary") # install devtools if already not installed  install.packages("devtools") #install toxSummary package devtools::install_github('phuse-org/toxSummary')

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results

what: Run the app with database connection
title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: example database can found GitHub repository database link database_path = "path///database.db"studyid_file = "path//IND_studyid_mapping.csv" Package contain database. Database big package.
code: library(toxSummary) toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = "path/of/your/database.db",     studyid_file = "path/for/IND_studyid_mapping.csv",     save_file_path = NULL )

what: How to run the app from cloned repo.
title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: Clone GitHub repo set repo working directory. don’t database connect want run app, run following code R console. run app database connection follow direction; set repo working directory open app.R file (copy code given ) run code. connect database change path files. otherwise connect example database available test_data directory. open toxSummary app. default/example database (“test_data/test_db.db” directory) contain studies.
code: pkgload::load_all(".") toxSummary::toxSummary_app() pkgload::load_all(".") db_path <- "test_data/test_db.db" study_list_path <- "test_data/IND_with_studies_2.csv" toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = db_path,     studyid_file = study_list_path,     save_file_path = NULL )

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: First create app.R file working directory. copy code change database file paths. Deploying Shiny app package little different. publish button open app.R file RStudio. Running rsconnect::writeManifest() command R console create manifest.json file. app can deployed rsconnect runningrsconnect::deployApp() command R console. Keep mind app running server, app need access files given database_path studyid_file argument.
code: toxSummary::toxSummary_app(     database_path = "path/of/your/database.db",     studyid_file = "path/for/IND_studyid_mapping.csv",     save_file_path = NULL,     where_to_run = "rsconnect")

title: Visualize and Summarize Nonclinical Study Results
text: demo app can found update link deploy new version

title: Run toxSummary app — toxSummary_app
code: toxSummary_app(   database_path = NULL,   studyid_file = NULL,   save_file_path = NULL,   where_to_run = "local" )

title: Run toxSummary app — toxSummary_app
text: database_path Optional, character file path database studyid_file Optional, character file path studyid save_file_path Optional, character path file saved app create files. NULL, file saved  working directory where_to_run Optional, character app running. Default "local". use "rsconnect" deploy rsconnect.
